sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO TH_READER_SUGM (READNO, NEWSCD, YYMM, SEQ, CHGSEQ, BOSEQ, SGBBCD, SGGBCD, BILLAMT, BILLQTY, SGYYMM, AMT, LOSSAMT, FEE1, FEE2, FEE3, SNDT, ICDT, CLDT, WRKNO, EDIPROCNO, AUTOPROCNO, BILLTYPECD, REMK, INDT, INPS, CHGDT, CHGPS, HINDT, HINPS) SELECT K.READNO, K.NEWSCD, K.YYMM, K.SEQ, (SELECT LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(CHGSEQ)),0)+1,3,0) FROM TH_READER_SUGM WHERE READNO = K.READNO AND NEWSCD = K.NEWSCD AND YYMM = K.YYMM AND SEQ = K.SEQ), K.BOSEQ, K.SGBBCD, K.SGGBCD, K.BILLAMT, K.BILLQTY, K.SGYYMM, K.AMT, K.LOSSAMT, K.FEE1, K.FEE2, K.FEE3, K.SNDT, K.ICDT, K.CLDT, K.WRKNO, K.EDIPROCNO, K.AUTOPROCNO, K.BILLTYPECD, K.REMK, K.INDT, K.INPS, SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE, 'SYSTEM' FROM TM_READER_SUGM K WHERE (K.READNO, K.NEWSCD, K.SEQ, K.YYMM, K.BOSEQ) IN (SELECT B.READNO, B.NEWSCD, B.SEQ, B.YYMM, B.BOSEQ FROM TM_READER_NEWS A, TM_READER_SUGM B WHERE A.READNO = B.READNO AND A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND A.NEWSCD = B.NEWSCD AND A.BOSEQ = B.BOSEQ AND B.YYMM <= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#yymm#, 'YYYYMM'), -24), 'YYYYMM') AND B.SGBBCD = '044')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE TM_READER_SUGM SET SGBBCD = '031', AMT= '0', SGYYMM = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#yymm#, 'YYYYMM'), -1), 'YYYYMM'), SNDT = #curDate#, ICDT = #curDate#, CLDT = #curDate#, CHGDT = SYSDATE, CHGPS = 'SYSTEM' WHERE (READNO, NEWSCD, SEQ, YYMM, BOSEQ) IN (SELECT B.READNO, B.NEWSCD, B.SEQ, B.YYMM, B.BOSEQ FROM TM_READER_NEWS A, TM_READER_SUGM B WHERE A.READNO = B.READNO AND A.SEQ = B.SEQ AND A.NEWSCD = B.NEWSCD AND A.BOSEQ = B.BOSEQ AND B.YYMM <= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#yymm#, 'YYYYMM'), -24), 'YYYYMM') AND B.SGBBCD = '044')
